messages.content: ComfyUI_Pic2Story is a simple node in ComfyUI based on the BLIP method, with the function of 'Image to Txt'.
What is the original model used in ComfyUI_Pic2Story?
The original model used in ComfyUI_Pic2Story is the Salesforce/blip-image-captioning-large model.
What is the specific model used in ComfyUI_Pic2Story?
The specific model used in ComfyUI_Pic2Story is the abhijit2111/Pic2Story model.
You can install ComfyUI_Pic2Story by cloning the GitHub repository in the .\ComfyUI \ custom_node directory using the command: git clone https://github.com/smthemex/ComfyUI_Pic2Story.git
Is a prompt necessary for using ComfyUI_Pic2Story?
No, a prompt is not necessary for using ComfyUI_Pic2Story.
Who are the authors of the BLIP paper cited in the ComfyUI_Pic2Story documentation?
The authors of the BLIP paper cited in the ComfyUI_Pic2Story documentation are Junnan Li, Dongxu Li, Caiming Xiong, and Steven Hoi.
What is the year of publication for the BLIP paper cited in the ComfyUI_Pic2Story documentation?
The year of publication for the BLIP paper cited in the ComfyUI_Pic2Story documentation is 2022.
